questions.quote: What, we talking hirachis? I know a great store for hirachis.
Oh, stop it. You know that friend of yours, Tim the dentist? I got an invitation to his Thanksgiving Eve party.
Well, go around, you bunch of crazies. You maniacs are gonna get us all killed.
You could pet them. They come right out of the water onto the sidewalks.
What about the Coast Guard? Seems like a lot of pride there, a lot of tradition.
Ladies and gentlemen, may I have your attention, please? Would Joel Rifkin report to the stadium office. Joel Rifkin...telephone.
I'm calling my lawyer. It might not be too late to get out of this.
Yeah, yeah. Well, I guess I started losing it when I was about twenty-eight right around the time I made my first million. You know what they say. The first million is the hardest one.
It's amazing. We, we both have dates on the same night. I can't remember the last time that happened.
Brett said you ran away from him, as if he were the boogetyman.
